column3: Corrections of Peripheral Variant for CANFD

column2: This document shows corrections of peripheral variant for CANFD.
[Before correction] 28. CAN with Flexible Data-rate (CANFD) This is the CANFD_B version of the CANFD peripheral module. CANFD_B is referred to as CANFD in this chapter.
[Before correction] (Please refer applicable chapters in Table 1.) Base address: CANFD_B = 0x400B_0000

column3: CFDC0NCFG : Channel 0 Nominal Bitrate Configuration Register
CFDC0DCFG : Channel 0 Data Bitrate Configuration Register
CFDGTINTSTS : Global TX Interrupt Status Register
CFDGAFLECTR : Global Acceptance Filter List Entry Control Register
CFDGAFLCFG : Global Acceptance Filter List Configuration Register
CFDGAFLIDr : Global Acceptance Filter List ID Registers (r = 1 to 16)
CFDGAFLMr : Global Acceptance Filter List Mask Registers (r = 1 to 16)
CFDGAFLP0r : Global Acceptance Filter List Pointer 0 Registers (r = 1 to 16)
CFDGAFLP1r : Global Acceptance Filter List Pointer 1 Registers (r = 1 to 16)
